email_template.name: community_product_submitted
email_template.subject: Community Product Submission for data.gov.my
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product **{{product_name}}** has been received for showcasing on https://data.gov.my. If it passes moderation checks (for spam, abuse, violence, etc.), it will be published on our[Community Products page](https://data.gov.my/community-products).

If the community product is approved/rejected, you will be notifiedat this email.

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,  
Public Sector Open Data Team

email_template.name: community_product_submitted
email_template.subject: Hantaran Produk Komuniti untuk data.gov.my
email_template.content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Penyerahan produk komuniti **{{product_name}}** anda telah diterima untuk dipamerkan di <https://data.gov.my>. Sekiranya ia lulus semakan moderasi (untuk
spam, penyalahgunaan, keganasan, dan sebagainya), ia akan diterbitkan di [halaman Produk Komuniti](https://data.gov.my/community-products) kami.

Sekiranya produk komuniti diluluskan/ditolak, anda akan dimaklumkan melalui e-mel ini.

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada pameran komuniti kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.
Pasukan Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
